member.name: IInitializeSpy.PostInitialize
member.summary: Performs initialization steps required after calling the function.
member.param: The apartment type passed to , specified as a member of the enumeration.
The number of times has been called on this thread.
member.returns: This method returns the value that it intends the call to return to its caller. For more information, see the Remarks section.

member.name: IInitializeSpy.PostUninitialize
member.summary: Performs cleanup steps required after calling the function.
member.param: The number of calls to remaining on this thread.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInitializeSpy.PreInitialize
member.summary: Performs initialization steps required before calling the function.
member.param: The apartment type passed to , specified as a member of the enumeration.
The number of times has been called on this thread.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInitializeSpy.PreUninitialize
member.summary: Performs cleanup steps required before calling the function.
member.param: The number of times has been called on this thread.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInitializeSpy
member.summary: Performs initialization or cleanup when entering or exiting a COM apartment.
